title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager
description: - to be included into the TW core
name: Palette Manager
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/history","text":"V 1.0.0 - 2024.04.18 * Settings are now in $:/ControlPanel -> ''Settings'' -> ''WikiLabs'' tab * Update version number to 1.0.0 from 0.11.1 (no new functions added) V 0.11.1 - 2024.01.27 * add tabbed-toc-expandable preview to $:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected tiddler * improve doc text in several other preview tiddlers V 0.11.0 - 2024.01.17 * Change the license: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/license V 0.10.1 - 2024.01.17 * Bugfix release: $:/ControlPanel -> $:/PaletteManager checkbox formatting problem V 0.10.0 - 2024.01.16 * The PaletteManager does ''not'' need a browser restart anymore ** "Cudos" go to Eric Shulman / TiddlyTools * Previews can be hidden now (default is visible) * Make the "search field" compatible with TiddlyTools PaletteManager ** Both palette managers can be used at the same time * It can now properly preview settings eg: rgba(0,200,0,0.7) * TT-PM can use the previews * WL-PM can use the X11 Colour settings and the custom colour picker V 0.9.2 - 2024.01.14 * Improve vertical readability in preview editor V 0.9.0 - 2024.01.12 * Big jump in the version number, because the functionality was stable for a long time now * The plugin uses $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/styles now ** This style tiddler also contains some TODOs to improve vanilla/base ** base/vanilla theme tiddler has been removed from the plugin. So it's not overwritten anymore ** $:/_tw5.com-styles has been removed from the plugin. So it's not overwritten anymore *** Problems previewing the "Big Green Download" button has been fixed upstream * improve serch help text * Improve vertical separation in preview editor * Improve help text in 17 preview tiddlers V 0.2.0 - 2022.11.16 * Docs refactoring and improvements * Cherrypick changes from master vanilla/base CSS * remove second search tab * add `@@highlighted text@@` preview V 0.1.0 - 2022.11.02 * New EditColourWidget ** New docs and examples for EditColourWidget * New "colour-picker-resolved Macro" ** New docs and examples for "colour-picker-resolved Macro" ** The macro and the widget belong together ** The macro is responsible to "resolve" different color-mode macros V 0.0.4 - 2022.09.04 * add search to palette manager * add search-terms to preview tiddlers * add focus button to preview heading for easier search grouping. It uses the first search-term element * palette manager is now a scrollable, to avoid jumpy scroll behaviour on search * < !! Feedback Feedback will be welcome at: [[to get feedback at Talk-TiddlyWiki|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/palette-manager-feature-complete-preview/5095]] ! Overview This plugin is an ''preview'' plugin, that should be implemented into the TW core in the future. * You can open it using the [[$:/PaletteManager]] ... where the previews look a bit different as if you open it with the * $:/ControlPanel --> Appearence --> Palette -> show editor button ! Important This plugin overwrites and adds the following system tiddlers: |Shadow Tiddler |Reason to change it atm |h |$:/PaletteManager |This is needed to get the new UI as shown in the image below | |New |Description |h |$:/PaletteManager/preview |Contains the whole preview code, which is `\import`ed to $:/PaletteManager | |$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/styles |Some specific adjustments needed - The goal is to implement most of them in vanilla/base | The full list of plugin tiddlers can be seen at: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager -> content tab "},"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs":{"title":"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs","caption":"WikiLabs","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","text":"Get an overview about all [[WikiLab Pugins|https://wikilabs.github.io]]
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ControlPanel/WikiLabs]!has[draft.of]]" default="$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/readme" explicitState="$:/state/tab/settings/wikilabs" />
"},"$:/palettes/preview/alert/example":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/alert/example","count":"10","created":"20220824110144443","modified":"20220826211839158","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing field 2","modified":"20220902211104291","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"some text in tiddler example"},"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected/previewTabbedToc-1":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected/previewTabbedToc-1","caption":"Tabbed TOC 1","tags":"previewTabbedToc","text":"Related to Preview: Tabs (__palettes_preview_tab-foreground-selected)"},"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected/previewTabbedToc-2":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected/previewTabbedToc-2","caption":"Tabbed background border highlight muted foreground","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$tiddler tiddler="$:/palettes/preview/alert/example"> {{||$:/core/ui/AlertTemplate}} general","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/PaletteManager]] \define xx() <$let colourName="foreground"> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/palette}} > <> \end {{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/background}} <<< |tc-pm-example |k |Usually goes with "{{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/foreground}}" |<> | "},"$:/palettes/preview/button-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/button-foreground","caption":"Button","created":"20220824121449584","modified":"20220902165107323","search-term":"button background border foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end ''Important:'' By default TW shows the browser "native" button settings. This setting can be different, depending on the browser and OS you use. <$let tv-config-toolbar-icons="yes" tv-config-toolbar-text="yes" tv-config-toolbar-class="" preview-button="$:/core/ui/Buttons/palette">
encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="description"/>
"},"$:/palettes/preview/code-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/code-foreground","caption":"Code","created":"20220824120858159","modified":"20220902181641972","search-term":"code background border foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"`inline code element`"},"$:/palettes/preview/diff-invisible-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/diff-invisible-foreground","caption":"Diff","created":"20220824121516065","modified":"20220902165240929","search-term":"diff delete background foreground equal insert invisible","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$diff-text source="Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better. Remember to let her into your heart Then you can start to make it better." dest="Hey Jude, don't be afraid. You were made to go out and get her. The minute you let her under your skin. Then you begin to make it better. "/>"},"$:/palettes/preview/dirty-indicator":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/dirty-indicator","caption":"Dirty","created":"20220824123436276","modified":"20220902165308621","search-term":"dirty indicator","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim You need to change anything here or create a New Tiddler to see the "dirty-indicator". <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class=<>> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}}/> "},"$:/palettes/preview/download-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/download-foreground","caption":"Download","created":"20220824124713351","modified":"20220907155237043","search-term":"download background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This preview uses `tc-btn-big-green` * The class in [[vanilla/base|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base]] theme is `tc-btn-big-green`, which is a bit strange, if defined differently * The class `tc-btn-download` at tiddlywiki.com is defined in [[$:/_tw5.com-styles|https://tiddlywiki.com/#%24%3A%2F_tw5.com-styles]], which makes more sense <$button class="tc-btn-big-green"> Dummy Download {{$:/core/images/save-button}} {{$:/core||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}}"},"$:/palettes/preview/dragger-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/dragger-foreground","caption":"Dragger","created":"20220824141830974","modified":"20220902165413156","search-term":"dragger background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"It seems the following classes are defined in vanilla/base but are ''never used'' ``` .tc-tiddler-dragger-inner { ... color: <>; ... background-color: <>; ... } ```"},"$:/palettes/preview/dropdown-border":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/dropdown-border","caption":"Dropdown","created":"20220824141931472","modified":"20220902165528625","search-term":"dropdown background border","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Test the ''mouse hover function!'' <$linkcatcher>
[[ see -- color: <>;]] [[ see -- background-color: <>;]]
"},"$:/palettes/preview/dropdown-tab-background-selected":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/dropdown-tab-background-selected","caption":"Dropdown Tab","created":"20220824143436354","modified":"20220902165609693","search-term":"dropdown tab background selected","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* Some "tab hovering" problems (TODO) ** It uses: `.tc-drop-down button:hover` *** `color: <>;` *** `background-color: <>;` * Probably usecase is in the search dropdown using [[Custom search results|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Customising%20search%20results]] ** It seems these settings are ''not in use'' at the moment. At least I could not find it ''Dummy Tabs ''
<>
"},"$:/palettes/preview/dropzone-background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/dropzone-background","caption":"Dropzone","created":"20220824185614075","modified":"20220902165631771","search-term":"dropzone background","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"To test this setting you need to ''drag and drop'' elements in the ''Right Sidebar -> Open tab'' ''Open Sidebar''
{{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/external-link-foreground-visited":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/external-link-foreground-visited","caption":"External Link","created":"20220824185755901","modified":"20220826140246076","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","search-term":"external link background hover visited foreground","text":"Most of the settings use native browser defaults atm. So links can depend on browser and OS native settings https://tiddlywiki.com --- hover is possible"},"$:/palettes/preview/foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/foreground","caption":"Foreground","created":"20220824190539420","modified":"20220907192637742","search-term":"foreground general","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/PaletteManager]] \define xx() <$let colourName="background"> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/palette}} > <> \end General tiddler text -- ''General tiddler text in bold'' <<< |tc-pm-example |k |Usually goes with "{{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/background}}" |<> | <<< "},"$:/palettes/preview/highlight-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/highlight-foreground","caption":"Highlight","created":"20221116121018728","modified":"20221116121155406","search-term":"highlight background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"``` Some @@highlighted@@ text. ``` Some @@highlighted@@ text."},"$:/palettes/preview/message-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/message-foreground","caption":"Message","created":"20220824190822151","modified":"20220902165825318","search-term":"message background border foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$linkcatcher>

This is a shadow tiddler. Any changes you make will override the default version from the plugin $:/core

"},"$:/palettes/preview/modal-header-border":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/modal-header-border","caption":"Modal","created":"20220824191547998","modified":"20220907135816042","search-term":"modal backdrop background border footer header","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"

"},"$:/palettes/preview/page-background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/page-background","caption":"Page Background","created":"20220824230508947","modified":"20220902181759309","search-term":"page background","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Page background"},"$:/palettes/preview/pre-border":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/pre-border","caption":"Pre","created":"20220824230802380","modified":"20220902170023941","search-term":"pre background border","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"``` Lorem ipsum ''dolor sit amet'', consectetur adipisicing elit ``` <<<.tc-big-quote @@white-space:normal; ''The ~TiddlyWiki is the best software I've ever found for organising my ideas.'' @@ <<<"},"$:/palettes/preview/primary":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/primary","caption":"Primary","created":"20220824231002539","modified":"20221104142353056","search-term":"primary","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Select an input element. The outline uses the `primary` colour <$edit-text class="tc-edit-max-width" tiddler="$:/temp/palette/test" tag=input/>
<$edit-text class="tc-edit-max-width" tiddler="$:/temp/palette/test" /> "},"$:/palettes/preview/select-tag-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/select-tag-foreground","caption":"Select","created":"20220824231600724","modified":"20220902170111059","search-term":"select tag background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define text() Lorem ipsum ''dolor sit amet'', consectetur adipisicing elit This element inherits option colour and background settings from parents or if undefined uses native browser settings. It seems the background colour is not used atm. TODO check that <$select tiddler="$:/temp/palette/test" > "},"$:/palettes/preview/selection-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/selection-foreground","caption":"Selection","created":"20220824233018470","modified":"20220902170132910","search-term":"selection background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"By default this element inherits the native browser settings ''Select some text'' in the text-area. <$edit-text class="tc-edit-max-width" tiddler="$:/temp/palette/test" />"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-button-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-button-foreground","caption":"Sidebar Buttons","created":"20220824233321748","modified":"20220902170209010","search-term":"sidebar button foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$let tv-config-toolbar-icons="yes" tv-config-toolbar-text="yes" tv-config-toolbar-class="" preview-button="$:/core/ui/Buttons/palette">
encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-controls-foreground-hover":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-controls-foreground-hover","caption":"Sidebar Controls","created":"20220824235800427","modified":"20220902170243747","search-term":"sidebar controls foreground hover","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''Links are deactivated, but New Tiddler works'' <$linkcatcher>
{{$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/pagecontrols}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-foreground-shadow":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-foreground-shadow","caption":"Sidebar Foreground Shadow","created":"20220826142022991","modified":"20220902170326137","search-term":"sidebar foreground shadow","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ToDo: Part of snowwhite theme ``` .tc-sidebar-header { text-shadow: 0 1px 0 <>; } ```"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-foreground","caption":"Sidebar Foreground","created":"20220826141712110","modified":"20220902170300862","search-term":"sidebar foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ToDo 5 different settings in base * Sidebar -> More -> Missing * TOC icon forgeround * subtitle foreground * Sidebar -> Recent ... date devider
show CSS code ``` .tc-sidebar-header { color: <>; fill: <>; } .tc-sidebar-header .tc-missing-tiddler-label { color: <>; } .tc-table-of-contents button { color: <>; } .tc-table-of-contents svg { width: 0.7em; height: 0.7em; vertical-align: middle; fill: <>; } ```
"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-muted-foreground-hover":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-muted-foreground-hover","caption":"Sidebar Muted","created":"20220825003704176","modified":"20220902170352960","search-term":"sidebar muted foreground hover","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''Hover'' the ''{{$:/language/CloseAll/Button}}'' button below to see the related hover color ''Open Sidebar''
{{$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open}}
''Standard Link'' eg: `[[test]]` are ''not'' effected [[$:/PaletteManager]]
[[:/palettes/components]]"},"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover","caption":"Sidebar Tiddler Links","created":"20220825005920939","modified":"20220903092544393","search-term":"sidebar tab background selected border divider foreground tiddler link hover","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"''Be aware:'' The last 2 elements `sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground` and `sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground-hover` are listed here, because they are prefixed `sidebar-`. At the moment there is no other way to show them. (TODO) The test-area below is scrollable. <$linkcatcher>
{{$:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/tabs}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/site-title-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/site-title-foreground","caption":"Site Title","created":"20220825012034243","modified":"20220902181834158","search-term":"site title foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define tv-wikilinks() no !.tc-site-title {{$:/SiteTitle}} Only work for "non-links" titles"},"$:/palettes/preview/static-alert-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/static-alert-foreground","caption":"Static Alert","created":"20220825012735305","modified":"20220902170619921","search-term":"static alert foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
This page is part of a static HTML representation of the ~TiddlyWiki at https://tiddlywiki.com/
"},"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tab-foreground-selected","caption":"Tabs","created":"20220825013206625","modified":"20220903092441701","search-term":"tab background selected border divider foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"The area below is a scrollable <$linkcatcher>
<>
The following example shows a tabbed-TOC example. * Use it, to test the ''mouse hover function'' ** The selected toc-tab uses `<>` so it cannot be defined here ** The :hover class uses `background: <>;` *** So background and `tab-background` and `tab-border` need to be slightly different to get a hover effect <$linkcatcher> <$macrocall $name="toc-tabbed-internal-nav" tag="previewTabbedToc" selectedTiddler="$:/temp/toc/selectedTiddler" unselectedText="

Select a topic in the table of contents. Click the arrow to expand a topic.

" missingText="

Missing tiddler.

" /> "},"$:/palettes/preview/table-header-background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/table-header-background","caption":"Table","created":"20220825112945378","modified":"20220902181944182","search-term":"table border footer background header","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"|myclass anotherClass|k |This is a caption |c |Header|Header|h |Cell1 |Cell2 | |Cell3 |Cell3 | |Footer|Footer|f "},"$:/palettes/preview/tag-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tag-foreground","caption":"Tags","created":"20220825113231577","modified":"20220902170757586","search-term":"tag background foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"@@white-space:normal; Important: Tag foreground is dynamically adjusted based on the brightness of the background
Know issue: https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/issues/6929 * <> * {{$:/core/ui/UntaggedTemplate}} --- <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/untagged-background"/>"},"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-border":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-border","caption":"Tiddler","created":"20220825120243619","modified":"20220902170823039","search-term":"tiddler background border","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"These colours will be visible for every tiddler here TODO create previews 4 elements in base * tc-tiddler-frame * tc-tiddler-border * tiddler in new window background "},"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-controls-foreground-selected":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-controls-foreground-selected","caption":"Tiddler Controls","created":"20220825121021869","modified":"20220902170907198","search-term":"tiddler controls foreground hover selected","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* All buttons are ''dummy buttons'' * View- Edit-toolbar buttons * Editor toolbar buttons ** Classes are inverted on :hover * Page Control if $:/ControlPanel is open <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/done-button}}
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/bold}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/italic}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/quote}}
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-selected">{{$:/core/images/options-button}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-editor-fields-odd":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-editor-fields-odd","caption":"Tiddler Editor Fields","created":"20220825124849856","modified":"20220902211014375","search-term":"tiddler editor background border image fields even odd","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"This preview shows a `tc-tiddler-edit-frame`
<$tiddler tiddler="$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-editor-fields-odd/example" > <$edit-text class="tc-edit-max-width" tiddler=<> /> {{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/fields}} {{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/type}}
"},"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-info-tab-background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/tiddler-info-tab-background","caption":"Tiddler Info","created":"20220825130350869","modified":"20220902171011371","search-term":"tiddler info background border tab","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfoSegment]!has[draft.of]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo]]" variable="listItem"><$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>

[[$:/PaletteManager]] \define xx(colourName) <$let colourName=<<__colourName__>> > <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/palette}} > <> \end ''Page Controls: ''With the current TW v5.3.3 vanilla/base theme, this parameter ''cannot'' be overwritten. Use the "sidebar-controls" instead. <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/save-button}} <<< |tc-pm-example |k |''Be aware:'' As soon as the wiki is "dirty" the "{{$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/dirty-indicator}}" is used |<> | <<<"},"$:/palettes/preview/untagged-background":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/untagged-background","caption":"Untagged","created":"20220825150355695","modified":"20220902171454168","search-term":"untagged background","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Important: It seems the untagged tag-pill uses the `tag-foreground` colour * Related to issue: https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5/issues/6929 * ToDo untagged should also use dynamic forground-colour adjustment {{$:/core/ui/UntaggedTemplate}}"},"$:/palettes/preview/very-muted-foreground":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/very-muted-foreground","caption":"Very Muted","created":"20220825150410478","modified":"20220902171508706","search-term":"very muted foreground","tags":"$:/tags/palette/preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" This setting can be tested when you import something into the wiki and the import is blocked, or the tiddler already exists. ''But'' it's used as a ''background'' setting there :/ TODO- check for `tc-tiddler-help` ``` .tc-tiddler-help a.tc-tiddlylink { color: <>; } .tc-import-table .tc-row-disabled { background: <>10; opacity: 0.8; } ``` "},"$:/palettes/preview/wikilist-url":{"title":"$:/palettes/preview/wikilist-url","caption":"Wikilist","created":"20220825150217084","modified":"20220826143643298","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"It seems they are used for TiddlyDesktop TODO: * Check if it's possible to dynamically add to the palette tiddlers?! * Test with TD and add a screenshot"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","list-after":"","text":"/* used for "activate" button if palette-tiddler is viewed */ .tc-title-button { font-size: initial; } /* Hack: to show $:/PaletteManager as a single tiddler */ [data-tiddler-title="$:/PaletteManager"] table { width: 100%; } /* ** Palette swatches */ /* Don't show those buttons in color-picker dropdown */ .tc-drop-down .tc-handle-palette-button { display: none; } .tc-palette-editor-scrollable { height: 80vh; position: relative; border: 1px solid <>; padding: 0 1em; } .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-preview-title, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-preview-cell, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-preview-empty-cell, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-palette-preview-empty-row, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-key-cell, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-colour-cell, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-table { border: none; } /* separate the different elements */ .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-preview-cell { padding-bottom: 1em; border-bottom: 6px double <>; } .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-key-cell, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-colour-cell { padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px; border-bottom: 1px solid <>; } .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-example th, .tc-palette-editor-scrollable .tc-pm-example td { padding-top: 3px; } .tc-palette-editor .tc-swatch { width: 1.2em; height: 1.2em; } input[type=text].tc-palette-manager-text-input { width: 75%; } input[type=color].tc-palette-manager-colour-input { width: 75%; padding: 0; } "},"$:/core/macros/colour-picker-resolved":{"title":"$:/core/macros/colour-picker-resolved","created":"20221003090255582","modified":"20221109105649733","tags":"$:/tags/MacroXXX DEPRECATED","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" \define getTooltip() $colourValue$ -- $resolvedColour$ \define macroPrefix() <> \define inputActions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=<> /> \end \define changeActions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=<> /> \end \define resolveColourActions() <$wikify name="resolvedColour" text="""<$macrocall $name=<<__resolver__>> tiddler=<<__palette__>> index=<<__colourName__>> />""" output=text mode=inline> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<<__colourName__>> $value=<> /> \end \define colour-picker-resolved(palette colourName class resolver:"resolveColourMacro" liveUpdate:"yes") \whitespace trim <$colour tiddler=<<__palette__>> index=<<__colourName__>> liveUpdate=<<__liveUpdate__>> class=<<__class__>> default="/temp/" tooltipTemplate=<> macroPrefix=<> macroSuffix=<> $input=<> $change=<> resolveColourActions=<> /> \end \define resolveColourMacro(tiddler index) \whitespace trim <$set name=colourResolved value={{{ [<__tiddler__>getindex<__index__>] }}}> <$list filter="[!prefix]" variable="ignore"> <$text text=<>/> <$list filter="[prefix]" variable="ignore"> <$set name=index filter={{{ [removeprefixremovesuffix] }}}> <$macrocall $name="resolveColourMacro" tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> index=<>/> \end \define resolveRgbMacro() \end "},"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins/AddPlugins":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Plugins/AddPlugins","created":"20220901182940281","modified":"20220901182943571","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> \end <> "},"$:/PaletteManager":{"title":"$:/PaletteManager","created":"20220831132430521","modified":"20221005105747807","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" \define popup() $:/state/popup/TiddlyTools/PaletteManager \define find() $(popup)$/find \define pick() $(popup)$/pick \define X11Colors() TiddlyTools/Settings/Colors/X11 \define previews() $:/temp/pm/showpreviews \define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/ \define describePaletteColour(colour) <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/$colour$"><$text text="$colour$"/> \end \define edit-colour-placeholder() edit $(colourName)$ \end \define colour-tooltip(showhide) $showhide$ editor for $(newColourName)$ \define resolve-colour(macrocall) \import $:/core/macros/utils \whitespace trim <$wikify name="name" text="""$macrocall$"""> <> \end \define show-colour-macro-editor() <$list filter="[getindexremoveprefix[<<]removesuffix[>>]] [getindexremoveprefix[<$]removesuffix[/>]]" variable="ignore"> <$set name="state" value={{{ [[$:/state/palettemanager/]addsuffixaddsuffix[/]addsuffix] }}}> <$wikify name="newColourName" text="""<$macrocall $name="resolve-colour" macrocall={{{ [getindex] }}}/>"""> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show"> <$button tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo="show"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}<$text text=<>/>
<$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show"> <$button tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>"""> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}}<$text text=<>/> <$reveal class="tc-palette-manager-colour-macro" tag="div" state=<> type="match" text="show"> <$set name="colourName" value=<>> <>
\end \define delete-colour-index-actions() <$action-setfield $index=<>/> \define reset-colour-index-actions() <$action-setfield $index=<> $value={{{ [{!!origin}getindex] }}} /> \end \define palette-manager-colour-row-segment() \import [[$:/snippets/currpalettepreview]] \whitespace trim <$edit-text index=<> tag="input" type="text" placeholder=<> default="" class="tc-palette-manager-text-input"/>
<> <$let originColour={{{ [{!!origin}getindex] }}} currentColour={{{ [all[current]getindex] }}} resetDisabled={{{ [all[current]!has[origin]then[yes]] :else[matchthen[yes]else[no]] }}} > <$button tooltip={{{ [{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Reset/Caption}addsuffix[ to: ]addsuffix] }}} aria-label={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Reset/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<> disabled=<> > {{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} <$list filter="[match[no]]" variable="ignore"> <$let currentTiddler={{!!origin}} colour=<> >
<>
<>
\end \define palette-manager-colour-row-pick() \define hex() ^#[A-Fa-f0-9]{3}$ \define hexa() ^#[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}$ <$eventcatcher $focusin="<>"> <$let colourValue={{{ [getindex] }}}> <$wikify name=resolvedValue text=<>> <$let colourValue={{{ [prefix[#]thenelse] }}}> <$let lower={{{ [lowercase[]] }}} colourValue={{{ [indexes[]] :filter[lowercase[]match] :map[getindex] +[!match[]else] }}}> <$let colourValue={{{ [regexpsplit[]!match[#]] :map[addsuffix] +[join[]!match[]addprefix[#]else] }}}> <$let colourValue={{{ [regexpsplit[]first[7]join[]] ~[] }}}> <$let dec={{{ [lowercase[]prefix[rgb]split[(]nth[2]trim[)]split[,]first[3]join[ ]] }}} hi={{{ [enlist:rawdivide[16]] :map[[0123456789ABCDEF]split[]zth] +[join[ ]] }}} lo={{{ [enlist:rawremainder[16]] :map[[0123456789ABCDEF]split[]zth] +[join[ ]] }}} r={{{ [enlist:rawnth[1]] =[enlist:rawnth[1]] +[join[]] }}} g={{{ [enlist:rawnth[2]] =[enlist:rawnth[2]] +[join[]] }}} b={{{ [enlist:rawnth[3]] =[enlist:rawnth[3]] +[join[]] }}} colourValue={{{ [] =[] =[] +[join[]!match[]addprefix[#]else] }}}> <$eventcatcher $change="<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}}/><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> index=<> tag=input class="tc-palette-manager-colour-input $(colourName)$" type="color" default=<>/> \end \define palette-manager-colour-row() \whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Delete/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/Delete/Hint}} class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<>> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} ''<$macrocall $name="describePaletteColour" colour=<>/>''
<$macrocall $name="colourName" $output="text/plain"/> <> <$list filter="[!has[text]then[yes]]" variable="show_previews">{{||$:/PaletteManager/preview}} \end \define activateShortList() [{$(find)$}prefix[<<]thenelse] \define getColour() [{$:/palette}indexes[]search:title{$(find)$}] \define useValue() [{$:/palette}indexes[]] :filter[{$:/palette}getindexprefix{$(find)$}] \define activateLongList() [match[yes]then] \define longList() [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]indexes[]search{$(find)$}] \define palette-manager-table() \whitespace trim <$let colorList={{{ [{$:/state/palettemanager/showexternal}] :cascade[append] }}}> <$list filter="[subfilter]" variable="colourName"> <>
\end \define countResults() <$let colorList={{{ [{$:/state/palettemanager/showexternal}] :cascade[append] }}} counter={{{[subfiltercount[]]}}}> <> \end \define cloneActions() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/palettes/]addsuffix] }}} $template={{$:/palette}} origin={{$:/palette}} name={{{ [{$:/palette}get[name]addsuffix] }}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end \define clearSearch() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> \end \define open-tiddler-in-window() <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> Open the Palette Manager in a ''new window'' \end \define activateTiddlerWindow() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/PaletteManager" windowTitle="Palette Editor -- Side by Side View" width="800" height="600" /> \end \whitespace trim <$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/palette}}> <>: <$link to={{$:/palette}} class="tc-small-gap-left"> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[name]] }}}/> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[description]] }}}/> <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$button class="tc-small-gap-left" message="tm-delete-tiddler" param={{$:/palette}}> <>
<$button actions=<> > <> <$text text={{{ [all[current]get[name]] }}}/> Origin: <$link class="tc-small-gap" to={{!!origin}}> <$let tv-wikilinks="no"> {{!!origin}} <$list filter="[{!!origin}is[shadow]is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> ''<>'' <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/palettemanager/showexternal" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> <>
<$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" default="yes" checked="yes" unchecked="no" checkactions="<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>"> Show previews <> Search: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" placeholder="colour name eg: alert" default="" class="tc-palette-manager-text-input tc-small-gap"/> -- <>--<$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-small-gap-left">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$scrollable class="tc-palette-editor-scrollable"> <> "},"$:/PaletteManager/preview":{"title":"$:/PaletteManager/preview","code-body":"yes","created":"20220901134315261","modified":"20220903171744665","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" \define popup() $:/state/popup/TiddlyTools/PaletteManager \define find() $(popup)$/find \define blank() [is[blank]then] \define search-is-token() [matchthen] \define colour-is-preview() [has[search-term]then] \define search() [all[shadows+tiddlers]prefixsearch:search-term{$(find)$}] \define palette-preview-row-segment() \whitespace trim <$vars previewName={{{ [addprefix[$:/palettes/preview/]] }}} token={{{ [split[-]nth[1]] }}} tokenPrefix={{{ [split[-]nth[1]addprefix[$:/palettes/preview/]] }}} > <$transclude tiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/_custom]] }}} mode="block"> <$set name=previewName filter="[{$(find)$}] :cascade[appendappendappend]" > <$list filter="[has[text]]" variable="preview"> <> \end \define set-focus() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{{ [get[search-term]enlist-input[]nth[1]] }}}/> \end \define focus-button() \whitespace trim <$button actions=<> tooltip="Set focus to this preview" aria-label="Set focus to this preview" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/close-others-button}} \end \define palette-manager-preview-row() \whitespace trim <$link to=<> > {{$:/language/Import/Listing/Preview}} <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption" /><> <$transclude mode="block" tiddler=<> />
\end <>"},"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview":{"title":"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview","created":"20220907172300686","modified":"20220909102505354","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim \define resolve-colour(macrocall) \import $:/core/macros/utils \whitespace trim <$wikify name="name" text="""$macrocall$"""> <> \end \define swatchStyle() background-color: $(swatchColour)$; \end \define swatch-inner() \whitespace trim <$set name="swatchColour" value={{##$(colourResolved)$}}> <$list filter="[!prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore">
> title=<<$(__x__)$>> /> <$list filter="[prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore"> <$wikify name="colourResolved" text="<$macrocall $name='resolve-colour' macrocall=<>/>"> <> \end \define swatch(x:swatchTitle) \whitespace trim <$set name="swatchColour" value={{##$(colour)$}}> <$set name="swatchTitle" value=<>> <$list filter="[!prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore">
> title=<<$x$>>/> <$list filter="[prefix[<>]]" variable="ignore"> <$wikify name="colourResolved" text="<$macrocall $name='resolve-colour' macrocall=<>/>"> <> \end \define getMessage(text) Do you wish to --$text$-- this palette? \define getTooltip(text) $text$ this palette \define handle-palette-button(text) \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/state/ShowPaletteEditor}match[yes]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[all[current]is[tiddler]]" variable=ignore> <$button class="tc-handle-palette-button tc-btn-invisible tc-float-right" tooltip=<> > <$action-confirm $message=<> > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[<__text__>match[reset]then[$:/core/images/refresh-button]else[$:/core/images/delete-button]]" variable="button"> <$transclude tiddler=<
